French: La technologie permet de communiquer facilement à distance.
English: Technology allows us to communicate easily from a distance.

French: Les applications mobiles ont facilité la communication entre les gens.
English: Mobile apps have made it easier for people to communicate.

French: Le courriel est une méthode de communication rapide et efficace.
English: Email is a quick and effective method of communication.

French: Les sites web ont permis aux gens de communiquer à travers le monde.
English: Websites have allowed people to communicate around the world.

French: La vidéoconférence est une forme de communication en temps réel.
English: Video conferencing is a form of real-time communication.

French: Les réseaux sociaux ont changé la façon dont les gens communiquent.
English: Social media has changed the way people communicate.

French: Les messageries instantanées ont facilité la communication entre les amis.
English: Instant messaging has made it easier for friends to communicate.

French: La communication par SMS est de plus en plus populaire.
English: Texting is becoming increasingly popular as a means of communication.

French: Les appareils mobiles ont permis une communication constante.
English: Mobile devices have made it possible to communicate constantly.
